default.value: Implemented comprehensive resilience features for shortwavereport: ErrorHandler for error classification and logging, RetryManager with exponential backoff, CircuitBreaker for SDR connection protection, RateLimiter for API throttling, GracefulDegradationManager for fallback strategies, and ResilienceManager for unified coordination. Updated SDRDiscoveryAgent and AudioCaptureAgent to use resilience mechanisms. Created comprehensive test suite with 18 passing tests covering all components.

Resilience implementation complete. Created 6 utility modules: error-handler.js, retry-manager.js, circuit-breaker.js, rate-limiter.js, graceful-degradation.js, resilience-manager.js. Updated agents with resilience integration. Added comprehensive test suite, environment configuration, and health monitoring endpoints. All major resilience patterns implemented and tested.

OpenRouter and OpenAI integration complete for shortwavereport. Created AIServiceManager with support for OpenRouter (free models), OpenAI (paid), and local mock. Added aiService for audio analysis and report generation. Created comprehensive setup guide, configuration management, health endpoints, and 25+ test cases. Users can now use free OpenRouter API keys instead of paid ChatGPT.
